        Destructor function, writeback data in data.

      • readData

        read the userlist and the meetinglist from text

        public void writeData()
        store the userlist and the meetinglist into txt.

      • registerNewUser

        public boolean registerNewUser(User user1)
        resigter a new user
        参数:
        user1 - User type, mean another a User wait for register.
        返回:
        true mean success, false mean not.

      • createNewMeeting

        public boolean createNewMeeting(Meeting meeting1)
        create a new meeting
        参数:
        meeting1 - Meeting type, mean new meeting information waitng for create wait for register.
        返回:
        true mean success, false mean not.

      • getNextId

        public java.lang.String getNextId()
        to get the next id can be used for a new meeting of meeting list
        返回:
        mean the next id can be use.

      • queryMeetingByDate

        public java.util.ArrayList<Meeting> queryMeetingByDate(User user1,
                                                       MyDate date_1,
                                                       MyDate date_2)
        query Meeting by user name and password and start end date
        参数:
        user1 - User type, mean the user who want to query his meeting.
        date_1 - MyDate type, mean the start date of the time he want to query.
        date_2 - MyDate type, mean the end date of the time he want to query.
        返回:
        a ArrayList of Meeting which are meet the requirements.

      • deleteByMeetingId

        public boolean deleteByMeetingId(User user1,
                                 java.lang.String id)
        delete Meeting by user name and password and start end date
        参数:
        user1 - User type, mean the user who want to delete his meeting.
        id - String type, mean the id of the meeting that he want to delete.
        返回:
        true mean delete successfully,false mean not.

      • clearByUser

        public boolean clearByUser(User user1)
        delete all Meeting of the user
        参数:
        user1 - User type, mean the user who want to delete his meeting.
        返回:
        true mean delete successfully,false mean not.
